name: EHhead Game Boss Fight
description:
This is my first cuphead game and it took me 2 hour to make. also this is made with scratch anyways here is the controls 

Arrow keys:

Z is to jump

X is to shoot

V is to dash

Sorry locking doesn't work with C :(

s to move 

Credits:

Sound and songs : Toby Fox

Thanks to @GreenCreeps for the help
